title: Base Agent Persona
description: The base schema for defining an agent persona, including its role, system prompt, and associated tools.

title.description: The human-readable, PascalCase name of the object (e.g., 'UniversalPhysicsState').

description.description: A clear, complete sentence explaining the object's purpose and function within the system.

schema_version.description: The semantic version of this schema definition (e.g., '1.0.0').

allowed_tools.description: A list of tool schema IDs that this persona is permitted to use.

role.description: A short, machine-readable description of the agent's role (e.g., 'structural_resolver', 'emotional_analyst').

system_prompt.description: The detailed system prompt that instructs the LLM on how to behave when adopting this persona.
